replies.body: I think the people should have the power. Mostly based off a voting system, give the judges less power. If the people want something, and more than 53% want it, give it to them. Any votes less than 53% (53%, 47%) and closer to 50%,50%, That's where the judges should come in.

replies.body:
1. If four kids called First, Second, Third, and Fourth are in a line, and First is after Third, but before fourth. Second is after First, but after third. Fourth is before Third, but is not second. 

    What is the order of the line?









2. You're typing on a keyboard and the screen goes up in flames. You have three choices: a Fire Extinguisher, a Bucket of Water, and your own breath (by the way you only can pick one). 

    What do you touch first?






Speaking of right, that's what the next question is about.




3. You're in the middle of a driving test. Your instructor tells you to go right. Then you say that you should go left. "This is a test," he says. He is sitting in the back looking to the other

replies.body:
1. This is impossible, as Fourth cannot be before Third, but after First, Which is after Third. 

2. Bucket of Water, as the reason my screen went up in flames is because I'm playing minecraft and I was lit on fire. Bucket of Water, and my screen is no longer on fire.

3. I don't know if you finished, but I think you meant "Looking to the other direction", which I'm assuming is the opposite way you're looking, which is to the back of the car. Therefore, you turn left because his right is your left.

100 QUESTIONS NO ONE EVER ASKS

May 6, 2014 by Amiyrah 17 Comments

As I ventured into video, I’ve started to love and loathe video tags. But lately, I have gone overboard with these amazingly fun video series. Vera of Lady and The Blog has been tagging me and like a moth to a flame, I comply. I fired up my handy mirrorless samsung camera, put on some make-up and got ready to film. This 100 questions no one ever asks tag just had me tickled. I loved seeing Vera’s videos and had a blast answering them myself. Below, is my first video which includes questions 1 to 50, and right below that is part 2 with questions 51 to 100.

DO YOU WANT TO ANSWER THE 100 QUESTIONS NO ONE EVER ASKS? HERE’S THE FULL LIST:

1. DO YOU SLEEP WITH YOUR CLOSET DOORS OPEN OR CLOSED?

2. DO YOU TAKE THE SHAMPOOS AND CONDITIONER BOTTLES FROM HOTELS?

3. DO YOU SLEEP WITH YOUR SHEETS TUCKED IN OR OUT?

4. HAVE YOU STOLEN A STREET SIGN BEFORE?

5. DO YOU LIKE TO USE POST-IT NOTES?

6. DO YOU CUT OUT COUPONS BUT THEN NEVER USE THEM?

7. WOULD YOU RATHER BE ATTACKED BY A BIG BEAR OR A SWARM OF BEES?

8. DO YOU HAVE FRECKLES?

9. DO YOU ALWAYS SMILE FOR PICTURES?

10. WHAT IS YOUR BIGGEST PET PEEVE?

11. DO YOU EVER COUNT YOUR STEPS WHEN YOU WALK?

12. HAVE YOU PEED IN THE WOODS?

13. HAVE YOU EVER POOPED IN THE WOODS?

14. DO YOU EVER DANCE EVEN IF THERES NO MUSIC PLAYING?

15. DO YOU CHEW YOUR PENS AND PENCILS?

16. HOW MANY PEOPLE HAVE YOU SLEPT WITH THIS WEEK?

17. WHAT SIZE IS YOUR BED?

18. WHAT IS YOUR SONG OF THE WEEK?

19. IS IT OK FOR GUYS TO WEAR PINK?

20. DO YOU STILL WATCH CARTOONS?

21. WHAT IS YOUR LEAST FAVORITE MOVIE?

22. WHERE WOULD YOU BURY HIDDEN TREASURE IF YOU HAD SOME?

23. WHAT DO YOU DRINK WITH DINNER?

24. WHAT DO YOU DIP A CHICKEN NUGGET IN?

25. WHAT IS YOUR FAVORITE FOOD?

26. WHAT MOVIES COULD YOU WATCH OVER AND OVER AGAIN AND STILL LOVE?

27. LAST PERSON YOU KISSED/KISSED YOU?

28. WERE YOU EVER A BOY/GIRL SCOUT?

29. WOULD YOU EVER STRIP OR POSE NUDE IN A MAGAZINE?

30. WHEN WAS THE LAST TIME YOU WROTE A LETTER TO SOMEONE ON PAPER?

31. CAN YOU CHANGE THE OIL ON A CAR?

32. EVER GOTTEN A SPEEDING TICKET?

33. EVER RAN OUT OF GAS?

34. WHAT’S YOUR FAVORITE KIND OF SANDWICH?

35. BEST THING TO EAT FOR BREAKFAST?

36. WHAT IS YOUR USUAL BEDTIME?

37. ARE YOU LAZY?

38. WHEN YOU WERE A KID, WHAT DID YOU DRESS UP AS FOR HALLOWEEN?

39. WHAT IS YOUR CHINESE ASTROLOGICAL SIGN?

40. HOW MANY LANGUAGES CAN YOU SPEAK?

41. DO YOU HAVE ANY MAGAZINE SUBSCRIPTIONS?

42. WHICH ARE BETTER: LEGOS OR LINCOLN LOGS?

43. ARE YOU STUBBORN?

44. WHO IS BETTER: LENO OR LETTERMAN?

45. EVER WATCH SOAP OPERAS?

46. ARE YOU AFRAID OF HEIGHTS?

47. DO YOU SING IN THE CAR?

48. DO YOU SING IN THE SHOWER?

49. DO YOU DANCE IN THE CAR?

50. EVER USED A GUN?

—————————–

51. LAST TIME YOU GOT A PORTRAIT TAKEN BY A PHOTOGRAPHER?

52. DO YOU THINK MUSICALS ARE CHEESY?

53. IS CHRISTMAS STRESSFUL?

54. EVER EAT A PIEROGI?

55. FAVORITE TYPE OF FRUIT PIE?

56. OCCUPATIONS YOU WANTED TO BE WHEN YOU WERE A KID?

57. DO YOU BELIEVE IN GHOSTS?

58. EVER HAVE A DEJA-VU FEELING?

59. DO YOU TAKE A VITAMIN DAILY?

60. DO YOU WEAR SLIPPERS?

61. DO YOU WEAR A BATH ROBE?
